import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';const initialState={user:null};export const userSlice=createSlice({name:'user',initialState,reducers:{setUserDetails:(state,action)=>{state.user=action.payload;}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
export const{setUserDetails}=userSlice.actions;export default userSlice.reducer;
